name: Benedikt Ahrens
content: Benedikt Ahrens' About me & Contact Benedikt Ahrens About me & Contact About me & Contact My Research Team Publications & preprints Talks Teaching CV Grants Supervision Work UniMath Scientific Activities PhD Dissertation Collaborators About me I am an assistant professor in the Programming Languages group at Delft University of Technology, Netherlands. I obtained my PhD in mathematics from Université Côte d’Azur, formerly Université Nice Sophia Antipolis, in Laboratoire Jean Alexandre Dieudonné. My research interests include: Semantics of programming languages Logic and type theory, in particular Homotopy Type Theory Formal proofs and formalized mathematics, in particular Univalent Foundations Functional programming Category theory in programming Contact and other info Email b.p.ahrens@tudelft.nl benedikt.ahrens@gmail.com Office Department of Software Technology Building 28 Office 3.E.280 (3rd floor, East corridor) Delft University of Technology Web ORCID: 0000-0002-6786-4538 arXiv: Ahrens_B github: benediktahrens This site is compiled with nanoc. Built from code written by Cyril Cohen.
